snippet: Excerpts from a van Gogh letter inspired the highlight work of this ensemble’s concert at St. Ignatius of Antioch Episcopal Church.
lead_paragraph: Excerpts from a van Gogh letter inspired the highlight work of this ensemble’s concert at St. Ignatius of Antioch Episcopal Church.

headline.main: Review: New Amsterdam Singers Perform a Text-Inspired Concert
headline.print_headline: A Choral Lift, With Music and Inspiring Words
